title: Authentication success with valid credentials
description: Verify that a user can successfully log in using valid credentials and receive appropriate session tokens.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter valid username/email and password
Submit the login form
Verify the user is redirected to the dashboard and a session is established

title: Authentication failure with invalid credentials
description: Verify that the system rejects login attempts with invalid username or password and shows an error message.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter invalid username/email or password
Submit the login form
Verify that the login is rejected and an appropriate error message is shown

title: Role-based access control enforcement
description: Verify that users can only access features and pages according to their assigned roles and permissions.

steps.description: Log in as a user with limited permissions
Attempt to access admin-only pages and perform restricted actions
Verify that access is denied or UI elements are disabled/hidden appropriately

title: Dashboard displays correct summary information
description: Verify that the dashboard accurately displays the daily tasks, vehicle statuses, and job statistics reflective of the system data.

steps.description: Log in as an authorized user
Navigate to the dashboard page
Verify that daily tasks, vehicle status, and job statistics are displayed correctly and match the backend data

title: Driver profile CRUD operations
description: Verify that user can create, read, update, and delete driver profiles through the UI.

steps.description: Navigate to the drivers management page
Create a new driver profile with valid details
Verify the new driver appears in the list with correct information
Update the driver profile with new information
Verify the updated information is saved and displayed
Delete the driver profile
Verify the driver no longer appears in the list

title: Bulk import drivers via Excel with valid data
description: Verify that bulk import of driver data using an Excel file imports all valid records and updates the system correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to the drivers management page
Initiate the bulk import process and upload a well-formed Excel file with multiple driver records
Verify that all drivers in the file are imported and displayed correctly

title: Bulk import drivers via Excel with malformed data
description: Verify the system handles invalid or corrupted Excel files gracefully and provides relevant error messages during bulk import of drivers.

steps.description: Navigate to the drivers management page
Attempt to upload a corrupted or incorrectly formatted Excel file for bulk driver import
Verify that the system rejects the file and shows appropriate error messages without importing data

title: Vehicle profile CRUD operations
description: Verify creating, reading, updating, and deleting vehicle profiles with status tracking and maintenance alert settings.

steps.description: Navigate to the vehicles management page
Create a new vehicle with valid details
Verify the vehicle appears in the list with correct details
Update the vehicle details and maintenance alert parameters
Verify updates are saved and reflected in the UI
Delete the vehicle record
Verify the vehicle no longer appears in the list

title: Bulk import vehicles via Excel with valid data
description: Verify successful import of multiple vehicles from a valid Excel spreadsheet updating vehicle fleet accurately.

steps.description: Navigate to the vehicles management page
Upload a properly formatted Excel file containing vehicle data for bulk import
Verify all vehicles in the file are imported and visible in the vehicles list

title: Planning and job creation with VRP settings
description: Verify that jobs can be created and planned effectively using the configurable Vehicle Routing Problem (VRP) settings including vehicle types, job types, and time windows.

steps.description: Navigate to the planning page
Create new job entries with all required details
Configure VRP settings such as vehicle types, time windows, and route preferences
Execute the route optimization process
Verify that jobs are assigned correctly and optimized routes are displayed on the map

title: Bulk import jobs via Excel
description: Verify that job records are successfully imported in bulk from Excel files and correctly processed in the system.

steps.description: Go to the planning page
Upload a valid Excel file containing multiple job records for bulk import
Verify all jobs from the file are created successfully and visible in the job list

title: Handling invalid job data in bulk import
description: Verify that invalid or incomplete job entries in bulk Excel import are rejected or reported with clear errors without corrupting valid data entries.

steps.description: Navigate to the planning page
Upload an Excel file containing some invalid or incomplete job data
Verify system reports errors for invalid rows and imports only valid job records without data corruption

title: Real-time GPS tracking map updates
description: Verify that the admin map interface displays real-time and accurate vehicle locations on Leaflet maps with frequent updates.

steps.description: Log in as admin and open the GPS tracking map page
Verify initial display of all tracked vehicles with their last known locations
Confirm vehicle locations update dynamically in real-time as tracking data changes

title: Job status update via Mobile PWA
description: Verify drivers can update job statuses from assigned tasks using the mobile PWA, and that status changes sync correctly to the backend.

steps.description: Log in on Mobile PWA as a driver
View assigned jobs and select one job
Update job status through available options
Verify status update is saved and reflected correctly in the backend and visible to admin

title: Offline support and sync for Mobile PWA job updates
description: Verify that Mobile PWA allows offline access to assigned jobs, enables status updates offline, and correctly syncs data when network is restored.

steps.description: Log in to Mobile PWA with internet connection
Go offline and access assigned jobs
Update job status while offline
Restore network connectivity
Verify offline job status updates are synced and reflected in the backend after reconnection

title: Filtering and searching jobs and orders
description: Verify that users can effectively filter and search jobs and shipments based on criteria such as status, date range, vehicle, driver, and other parameters.

steps.description: Navigate to job or shipment management page
Apply various filters and search queries with valid criteria
Verify that job and shipment lists update correctly reflecting the filter and search parameters

title: Shipment assignment via tap menu
description: Verify users can assign jobs or shipments to vehicles through the tap menu and that assignment status updates correctly.

steps.description: Navigate to the shipment/job assignment interface
Select one or more jobs and assign to a vehicle using tap menu
Verify assignments are recorded, shown in UI, and vehicle assignments reflect accurately in routing

title: VRP routing parameter validations
description: Verify that the Vehicle Routing Problem configuration interface validates inputs for vehicle types, job types, time windows, and route preferences preventing invalid settings.

steps.description: Access VRP configuration settings
Input invalid or conflicting parameters such as overlapping time windows, invalid vehicle types, or negative preferences
Verify that the system provides validation warnings/errors and prevents saving invalid configurations

title: UI responsiveness and accessibility compliance
description: Verify that all main pages including dashboard, drivers, vehicles, planning and maps render correctly on various screen sizes and support keyboard navigation and screen readers.

steps.description: Access key pages on desktop, tablet, and mobile screen sizes
Verify layout adapts correctly and no content is clipped or distorted
Navigate UI using keyboard only and activate all clickable elements
Verify focus states are visible and navigation is logical and complete
Use screen reader to inspect main content and controls
Verify all important elements have accessible labels and no critical information is missing

title: API input validation and error responses
description: Verify all API endpoints related to authentication, driver/vehicle/job management, routing, and tracking enforce strict input validation and return appropriate error responses for invalid or malicious inputs.

steps.description: Send API requests with missing mandatory fields, invalid data types, and malicious payloads
Confirm APIs reject invalid requests with correct HTTP status codes and error messages without compromising system stability
